Detailed Description

The base class of the functions.

This class allows the the notification call to be executed without knowing the exact specifics of a given functor.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MuleNotify::CMuleNotiferBase::CMuleNotiferBase (  )  [inline]

The constructor does nothing.

virtual MuleNotify::CMuleNotiferBase::~CMuleNotiferBase (  )  [inline, virtual]

The destructor is virtual since we will be deleting pointers to this type.
